body.name: FAITDER X7Plus 5.1 inch Handheld Game Console Supports 10500+ Free Games PS1/GBC/GBA/FC/MD/Arcade, Dual Joystick Portable Retro Game Console/MP3/MP4/MP5/Video/Music Kids Adult Birthday Gifts
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 32 mins
features: 🎁🎮🎄🎀【INTIMATE CUSTOMER SERVICE】If you have any questions about our products, please contact us for product support! We'll help you with a return or exchange with a free 90-day warranty.

🎁🎮🎄🎀【 8G LARGE MEMORY】Built-in 8GB memory, which can store more photos and videos of your favorite games (you can also change to a larger memory card), and switch between multiple language versions at will (if you receive a language other than the one you need, please contact us to help you change)

🎁🎮🎄🎀 【Free 10500 games】Built-in 10000+ classic games. Home page shortcut 12 classic games!More games are [Game] viewed in the folder, and you can also download games in related formats. Arcade Game Support/Famicom (FC, SFC)/Gameboy(GBA, GBC)/Megadrive (MD)
🎁🎮🎄🎀【VERSATILE CONSOLE】 Not only a Game Console but also Music Player, Video Player, E-book, Stopwatch, Calculator.It can connect to PC with USB cable, supported Win2000/Vista/XP/Win7/Win8/Win10

🎁🎮🎄🎀【5.1-INCH LARGE SCREEN】 Large full-color TFT LCD screen, double protection, no eye damage for a long time. It has anti-scratch and anti-drop functions, bringing exciting gaming experience and better eye protection.-scratch and anti-drop functions, bringing exciting gaming experience and better eye protection.

🎁🎮🎄🎀【 LONG STANDBY TIME】 Built-in 1500mAh high capacity lithium battery for ultra-long standby time and battery life. Support up to 5 hours game playing and 50 hours music playing. Brings lots of joy and happiness to you during a trip or a long journey.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Dual rocker 2 True Stereo

X7 Plus Specifications True color screen: 5.1-inch 16-million-color 16:9 true color screen, resolution 800*480 Game format Built-in 6800+ non-repeating games, support PS1/MAME/GBA/GBC/GB/NES/SFC/FC/SMD/MD and other ten emulators Battery life: Approximately:5-8 hours，Approximately:20-25 days TV output Support HDMI high-definition TV output, which can be connected to the TV to play games and watch movies Video playback No conversion is required, and it supports RM/VB/VA/I/FL/V and other formats Music playback Support MP3/WM/A/OGG/ACC/WA/V support APE/FLAC dual lossless music Configure memory Built-in 8G memory, support 128M to 64GBTF card expansion Digital recordings Built-in high-definition microphone, high-quality recording and normal recording for you to choose Image browsing Support JPEG, BMP, GIF, TIF, PNG image browsing Reading Texts TXT e-book, unique bookmark function, easy to read anytime, anywhere Processor Quad-core chip ATJ2273-128 bits processor, powerful performance and smooth operation Battery life: Approximately:5-8 hours，Approximately:20-25 days Speaker High quality double horn stereo speaker Multilingual English/Polish/Japanese/Korean/French/German/Italian/Turkish/Portuguese/Spanish/Dutch/Russian. (Default English) Packaging Accessories 300g,20*10*6 CM, earphone cable, data cable, manual, AV cable
Packing List : 1.Game console x 1 2.Cable x 1 3.Instruction manual x 1 4.Headphone x 1 5.Chinese and English manual x 1

How can I find more games? The homepage of the game console displays 12 game icons, and more exciting games can be found in the folders [Game] How do I download the game to my console? 1. Use a USB cable to connect the game console to the computer, put the game ROM into the game folder, support: PS1/MAME/GBA/GBC/GB/NES/SFC/FC/SMD/MD format 2. Download the Product guides and documents FAQ (PDF),There are graphic operation methods How do I save my game progress? 1. Select the ESC key to jump out of the menu 2. Select Save Progress and press B to confirm 3. Download the product guide and document FAQ (PDF) with detailed graphic operation methods

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worse game console
reviews.reviewText: Ok so let's Start with the instructions. Just awful and the manual is so tiny that it didn't help. For the price I paid it should have been good. My girlfriend needed something to destress by playing games. So she opened up and struggled with the whole thing. Instead of destressing she stressed was out. The console buttons at times just didnt work. When she tried to access the other games installed she couldn't open them to play. I regret getting this imitation of nintendo. Not worth the money and I returned it. Not making this mistake again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FAITDER X7Plus Handheld Game Console - Your All-in-One Entertainment Hub!
reviews.reviewText: The FAITDER X7Plus is a versatile gaming marvel that goes beyond expectations. With a generous 8GB built-in memory (expandable with a larger memory card), this handheld console supports multiple language versions, ensuring a personalized experience for every user.Loaded with a whopping 10500+ free games, including classics from PS1, GBC, GBA, FC, MD, and Arcade, the X7Plus delivers an extensive gaming library. The large 5.1-inch full-color TFT LCD screen provides an immersive gaming experience with anti-scratch and anti-drop features, ensuring eye protection during extended gameplay.Not just a gaming console, the X7Plus doubles as a Music Player, Video Player, E-book reader, Stopwatch, and Calculator. Connect it to your PC via USB for additional versatility, supporting various Windows versions.The 1500mAh high-capacity lithium battery ensures long standby and gameplay times, offering up to 5 hours of gaming and 50 hours of music playback. The X7Plus is the perfect companion for trips and long journeys, bringing joy and happiness wherever you go.Unleash the joy of gaming and entertainment with the FAITDER X7Plus - an all-in-one handheld console that makes an ideal gift for kids and adults alike.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Faitder plus hand held game review
reviews.reviewText: I purchased to of these hand held games for my grand sons. Their cousins have Nintendo switch and Wii U and otherGames I felt bad that they didn't have any games I didn't have money for the Nintendo switch and Wii U I decided toBuy this game it's pre installed with lots of games which they likeThey hooked it up to their TV and they can play it hand held I like that screen isn't real smallIt's not really big but just right a little more than 5 inches and it's durable and doable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Large screen but game resolution is almost unreadable
reviews.reviewText: This item was embarrassing. You are better off buying a "Nintendo switch hand held only" console for $199 than this thing. The menus on this were very difficult to maneuver and the game resolution was virtually unreadable with many of them even in Chinese. That all makes the nice big screen worthless. Dont waster your time on this - I returned today!

reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Wouldn't turn on
reviews.reviewText: Did everything as instructed and still would not turn on. Returned it back to Amazon. I should have seen the red flag when it gave the disclaimer about it not working. My bad
